description:
In the wake of Samurai X`s departure, everyone at the dojo is anxious to join the battle against Shishio. With Sanosuke, Kaoru and Yahiko in pursuit, Kenshin encounters Misao, a young girl who also happens to be a clever thief.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En Güçlü Olarak Anılmak İçin: Aoshi`nin Yeni Çatışması
Saikyou no Shougou o Tsukamu made! Aoshi no Aratanaru Tatakai
最強の称号を掴むまで! 蒼紫の新たなる闘い
